about_the_game:
DommeBreaker is a BDSM focused game with turn-based combat, unlockable skills and upgrades, minor management elements and lots of sexy art accompanying hot stories with a touch of humour.

From the creators of Femdom Waifu, Stories of Submission and several other Femdom games.

Summary



After losing another job by fucking the wrong woman, Michael is presented with an unusual offer: making his living fucking the wrong woman. Specifically: Hana, the wife of his cuck best friend.

This unexpected offer takes an even more outrageous (and sexier) turn when Hana reveals she has plans of her own. Now Michael is on a quest to make hot, dominant women submit to him by resisting their powers of seduction and making them give in to their own lust.

Features



■ Hot Dommes: Each with their own style, specialized fetish, techniques and story. At least one of them is sure to appeal to your dirty, depraved tastes.
■ Dominance Battles: Use various skills and upgrades to resist each Domme's techniques. Put them in their place and prove your dominance.
■ Corruption: As you break down each Domme bit by bit, their attitude, mannerisms and outfits will change until you've made them submit completely.
■ It's free.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains elements of BDSM, rough sex and various fetishes including: NTR, Corruption, Mindbreak, maledom, femdom, public exposure, public sex, humiliation, degradation and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: 16:9 aspect ratio
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Encounter hot Dominatrixes, each with their own style and fetish, conquer them through Dominance Battles and enjoy the sexy rewards of awakening their lust.
